summary: The diff implements all five requirements from the BuildRequest. REQ-9 (authentication gate) is implemented with ProtectedRoute component, LoginPage, and route protection logic. REQ-10 (decorative backgrounds) is implemented via CSS classes in index.css. REQ-11 (quote update) is visible in LandingPage.tsx and LoginPage.tsx. REQ-12 (image removal) appears to be completed based on prior project state. REQ-13 (image generation) is referenced via asset paths but the actual generated images are not shown in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate decorative images for transparent weight/dumbbell illustrations and nature elements (leaves, mountains, trees) to be used as static assets for the background decoration feature
missing_requirements.reason: The diff references image paths in frontend/src/index.css (weight-decoration-left.dim_200x300.png, weight-decoration-right.dim_200x300.png, nature-decoration-top.dim_400x200.png, nature-decoration-bottom.dim_400x200.png) but does not show the actual generated image files being added to frontend/public/assets/generated directory
